dialogue: Spirit was in low spirits as she left the center.
Great, without Toni's help, I need to
come up with another way to make money.
Well, if it isn't Spirit. What's this about you having money problems?
Shoju! What're you doing back in town?
I thought you went off to the war,
looking for your 'guts or glory'.
What, did you come back crying your pants off,
tail between your legs scared?
Ha ha, very funny. I'll have you know,
I'm a valued elite of the Army.
Guess the Army's really lacking in personnel...
...Well, you're not wrong there.
That's actually what I wanted to talk to you about.
Huh?
You're having your 'money problems', and the Army is recruiting.
You could run flier jobs, couriering goods and messages.
You’re guaranteed a good wage because of your reputation.
Jeez, here we are, meeting again in who knows how long
and you’re trying to sell me on that stupid war?
I just, I dont know, I really dont want to be part of it all…
Come on, you said you're strapped for cash, right?
Do you really think you can afford to reject this?
ugh...
